Text: can this game run on the ePSXe (PS1 emulator for pc) emulator? ...i need help cause i want to play this game so badly...can any1 plz help me? thanks for ur time :)
@ KFpcGAMER: This is the converter version for PSP, you can find the iso or bin/cue files in several forums in order to play it on PC (e.g. emuparadise).
